title: STASH

properties.name: description
properties.value: STASH units (short for "Store Things And Stuff Here"), also known as Hidey Holes, are storage units for emote clue items, saving bank space and bank trips for players who do Treasure Trails frequently. Free-to-play players cannot deposit or withdraw from any STASH unit.

content:
The RuneScape Wiki also has an article on: rsw:Hidey-holes
A player stores items required for an emote clue in a crate that has been repurposed into a STASH unit.

STASH units (short for "Store Things And Stuff Here"), also known as Hidey Holes, are storage units for emote clue items, saving bank space and bank trips for players who do Treasure Trails frequently. Free-to-play players cannot deposit or withdraw from any STASH unit.

There are 109 STASH units in total found throughout Gielinor. These locations are initially labelled as inconspicuous bushes/crates/holes/rocks and, once built, become usable STASH units. Players can check which units they've already built/filled by visiting Watson and reading the noticeboard within his house, or by building a S.t.a.s.h chart in the study of their player-owned house.

Contents

  • 1 Materials
  • 2 Types
  • 3 List of STASH units
    • 3.1 Beginner

    • 3.3 Medium
    • 3.4 Hard
    • 3.5 Elite
    • 3.6 Master
  • 4 References

Materials[edit | edit source]

The materials and level required to build these inconspicuous objects into STASH units depend on the tier of clue scroll they relate to (boosts can be used, including the Crystal saw).

A hammer and a saw are required to build STASH units.

All 10 nails must be made of the same metal. Since nails cannot be bent while constructing STASH units, cheap nails are the best option for them.

STASH type Level Materials (+ hammer, saw) Experience Number Total Experience Total cost including items
Beginner 12 2 planks, 10 nails 150 3 450 2,340
Easy 27 2 planks, 10 nails 150 29 4,350 44,243
Medium 42 2 oak planks, 10 nails 250 23 5,750 174,703
Hard 55 2 teak planks, 10 nails 400 15 6,000 665,597
Elite 77 2 mahogany planks, 10 nails 600 17 10,200 1,245,252
Master 88 2 mahogany planks, 1 gold leaf, 10 nails 1,500 22 33,000 50,135,353
Totals 109 59,750 52,267,488

Types[edit | edit source]

Depending on the scenery the emote clue is located in, STASH may differ in appearance to appear as inconspicuous as possible.

Inconspicuous objects
Bush Crate Hole Rocks
Constructed STASH units
Bush Crate Hole Rocks

A full list of items required can be found here.
